de.lessvoid.nifty.node

Class SizeLayoutNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.node.SizeLayoutNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiftyNode

    public final class SizeLayoutNode
extends Object
implements NiftyNode
    This layout node allows to set a specific size that is applied to all child nodes.

    This size can be treated as fixed size or as a maximal or minimal value for the size.

    Author:
    Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>
